com.imaginea.mongodb.services
Interface DocumentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DocumentServiceImpl
public interface DocumentService

Defines services definitions for performing operations like create/update/delete on documents inside a collection in a database present in mongo to which we are connected to. Also provides service to get list of all documents present.

Since:
6 July 2011
Author:
Rachit Mittal

Method Detail

getQueriedDocsList

ArrayList<com.mongodb.DBObject> getQueriedDocsList(String dbName,
                                                   String collectionName,
                                                   com.mongodb.DBObject query,
                                                   com.mongodb.DBObject keys,
                                                   int limit,
                                                   int skip)
                                                   throws DatabaseException,
                                                          CollectionException,
                                                          DocumentException,
                                                          ValidationException
Gets the list of documents inside a collection in a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of Database
collectionName - Name of Collection from which to get all Documents
query - query to be performed. In case of empty query {} return all docs.
keys - Keys to be present in the resulted docs.
limit - Number of docs to show.
skip - Docs to skip from the front.
Returns:
List of all documents.
Throws:
EmptyDatabaseNameException - If database name is null
EmptyCollectionNameException - If Collection name is null
UndefinedDatabaseException - If database is not present
UndefinedCollectionException - If Collection is not present
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException,EmptyCollectionNameException
CollectionException - throw super type of UndefinedCollectionException
DocumentException - exception while performing get doc list

insertDocument

String insertDocument(String dbName,
                      String collectionName,
                      com.mongodb.DBObject document)
                      throws DatabaseException,
                             CollectionException,
                             DocumentException,
                             ValidationException
Insert a document inside a collection in a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of Database
collectionName - Name of Collection from which to get all Documents
document - : Document data to be inserted
Returns:
: Insertion Status
Throws:
EmptyDatabaseNameException - If database name is null
EmptyCollectionNameException - If Collection name is null
EmptyDocumentDataException - If Document data is null
UndefinedDatabaseException - If database is not present
UndefinedCollectionException - If Collection is not present
InsertDocumentException - Any exception while inserting document
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException,EmptyCollectionNameException ,EmptyDocumentDataException
CollectionException - throw super type of UndefinedCollectionException
DocumentException - throw super type of InsertDocumentException

updateDocument

String updateDocument(String dbName,
                      String collectionName,
                      org.bson.types.ObjectId id,
                      com.mongodb.DBObject newData)
                      throws DatabaseException,
                             CollectionException,
                             DocumentException,
                             ValidationException
Updates a document inside a collection in a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of Database
collectionName - Name of Collection from which to get all Documents
id - Id of Document to be updated
newData - new Document value.
Returns:
Update status
Throws:
EmptyDatabaseNameException - If database name is null
EmptyCollectionNameException - If Collection name is null
EmptyDocumentDataException - If Document data is null
UndefinedDatabaseException - If database is not present
UndefinedCollectionException - If Collection is not present
UpdateDocumentException - Any exception while updating document
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException,EmptyCollectionNameException ,EmptyDocumentDataException
CollectionException - throw super type of UndefinedCollectionException
DocumentException - throw super type of UpdateDocumentException

deleteDocument

String deleteDocument(String dbName,
                      String collectionName,
                      org.bson.types.ObjectId id)
                      throws DatabaseException,
                             CollectionException,
                             DocumentException,
                             ValidationException
Deletes a document inside a collection in a database in mongo to which user is connected to.

Parameters:
dbName - Name of Database
collectionName - Name of Collection from which to get all Documents
id - Id of Document to be updated
Returns:
Deletion status
Throws:
EmptyDatabaseNameException - If database name is null
EmptyCollectionNameException - If Collection name is null
EmptyDocumentDataException - If Document data is null
UndefinedDatabaseException - If database is not present
UndefinedCollectionException - If Collection is not present
DeleteDocumentException - Any exception while deleting document
DatabaseException - throw super type of UndefinedDatabaseException
ValidationException - throw super type of EmptyDatabaseNameException,EmptyCollectionNameException ,EmptyDocumentDataException
CollectionException - throw super type of UndefinedCollectionException
DocumentException - throw super type of DeleteDocumentException
